headline: Is There Still Value In Booking Holdings (BKNG) After The Recent Share Price Pullback
summary: If you are wondering whether Booking Holdings at around US$5,115.91 per share still offers value, you are not alone. The stock’s recent moves have many investors reassessing what a fair price looks like. The share price has seen a 6.8% decline over the last 7 days and a 4.2% decline over the last 30 days, while the 1 year return sits at 4.6% and the 3 year return is up 121.8% with a 5 year return of 151.6%. These price moves sit against a backdrop of ongoing interest in travel and online...
